game.description: Protect your bed and destroy enemy beds. Upgrade your equipment and team by collecting Iron, Gold, Emerald and Diamond from the generators to access powerful upgrades.

shop.hotbar-manager.name: Hotbar Manager
shop.hotbar-manager.lore:
Edit preferred slots for your
items per category.
shop.hotbar-manager.navbar.lore:
Click to change the position
to favor that slot when
purchasing an item this
category or on spawn.
shop.tracker.name: Tracker Shop
shop.tracker.lore:
Purchase tracking upgrade for
your compass which will track
each player on a specific team
until you die.
inv.tracker.title: Purchase Enemy Tracker
tracker.item.name: Track Team
tracker.already.have.team: You already have a tracker for a team!
tracker.team.have.bed: Not all enemy beds are destroyed yet!
tracker.inv.item.name: Compass
item.gamestyle.title: Game style
item.iron.name: Iron
item.gold.name: Gold
item.diamond.name: Diamond
item.emerald.name: Emerald
item.wool.name: Wool
item.wool.lore:
Perfect for building bridges
between islands. Adopts the
color of your team.
item.hard-clay.name: Hardened Clay
item.hard-clay.lore:
Basic block for defending your
bed.
item.glass.name: Glass
item.end-stone.name: End Stone
item.end-stone.lore:
Solid block for defending your
bed.
item.ladder.name: Ladder
item.ladder.lore: Surely the most useful item in Bedwars.
item.wood.name: Oak Planks
item.wood.lore: A good block to defend your bed. Resists well against picks.
item.obsidian.name: Obsidian
item.stone-sword.name: Stone Sword
item.iron-sword.name: Iron Sword
item.diamond-sword.name: Diamond Sword
item.stick.name: Stick (Knockback I)
item.chainmail-armor.name: Permanent Chainmail Armor
item.chainmail-armor.lore:
Chainmail pants and boots that you
always respawn with.
item.iron-armor.name: Permanent Iron Armor
item.iron-armor.lore:
Iron pants and boots that you
always respawn with.
item.diamond-armor.name: Permanent Diamond Armor
item.diamond-armor.lore:
Diamond pants and boots that you
always respawn with.
item.shears.name: Permanent Shears
item.shears.lore:
Useful for getting rid of wool. You always
respawn with these shears.
item.pickaxe-tier-1.name: Wooden Pickaxe (Efficiency I)
item.pickaxe-tier-2.name: Iron Pickaxe (Efficiency II)
item.pickaxe-tier-3.name: Golden Pickaxe (Efficiency III)
item.pickaxe-tier-4.name: Diamond Pickaxe (Efficiency III)
item.pickaxe.lore:
This item can be upgraded. It will downgrade by one level when you die!

You always respawn with the minimum level.
item.axe-tier-1.name: Wooden Axe (Efficiency I)
item.axe-tier-2.name: Iron Axe (Efficiency I)
item.axe-tier-3.name: Golden Axe (Efficiency II)
item.axe-tier-4.name: Diamond Axe (Efficiency III)
item.axe.lore:
This item can be upgraded. It will downgrade by one level when you die!

You always respawn with the minimum level.
item.arrow.name: Arrow
item.bow.name: Bow
item.bow-power.name: Bow (Power I)
item.bow-punch.name: Bow (Power I, Punch I)
item.potion-speed.name: Speed Potion II (45 seconds)
item.potion-jump.name: Jump Potion V (45 seconds)
item.potion-invisibility.name: Invisibility Potion (30 seconds)
item.golden-apple.name: Golden Apple
item.bedbug.name: Silverfish
item.bedbug.lore: Sends silverfish when the ball lands to distract your enemies. Lasts for 15 seconds.
item.dream-defender.name: Dream Defender Golem
item.dream-defender.lore: Iron golems to help defend your base. Last for only 4 minutes.
item.fireball.name: Fireball
item.fireball.lore:
Right-click to launch! This
is effective for ejecting enemies
walking on narrow bridges.
item.tnt.name: TNT
item.tnt.lore:
Ignites instantly,
excellent for breaking a defense!
item.ender-pearl.name: Ender Pearl
item.ender-pearl.lore:
The fastest way to invade
enemy bases.
item.water-bucket.name: Water Bucket
item.water-bucket.lore:
Good for slowing down the approaching
enemy. Can also protect against TNT.
item.bridge-egg.name: Egg Bridge
item.bridge-egg.lore:
This egg creates a bridge on its
path when thrown.
item.magic-milk.name: Magic Milk
item.magic-milk.lore:
Prevents traps from triggering
during the 30 seconds
following its consumption.
item.sponge.name: Sponge
item.compact-tower.name: Compact Defense Tower
inventory.upgrade.title: Upgrades & Traps
upgrade.disabled: Upgrades are disabled in this game.
trap.disabled: Traps are disabled in this game.
potion.disabled: Potions are disabled in this game.
upgrade.sharpness.name: Sharp Swords
upgrade.sharpness.lore:
Your team will benefit from
Sharpness I enchantment.
upgrade.sharpness.tier-1.name: Sharpness I
upgrade.sharpness.tier-2.name: Sharpness II
upgrade.sharpness.tier-3.name: Sharpness III
upgrade.sharpness.tier-4.name: Sharpness IV
upgrade.protection.name: Reinforced Armor
upgrade.protection.lore:
Your team will benefit from
Protection enchantment on its armor pieces.
upgrade.protection.tier-1.name: Protection I
upgrade.protection.tier-2.name: Protection II
upgrade.protection.tier-3.name: Protection III
upgrade.protection.tier-4.name: Protection IV
upgrade.miner.name: Maniac Miner
upgrade.miner.lore:
Players on your team will
benefit from Haste.
upgrade.miner.tier-1.name: Haste I
upgrade.miner.tier-2.name: Haste II
upgrade.forge.name: Iron Forge
upgrade.forge.lore:
Improves resource generation
on your island.
upgrade.forge.tier-1.name: +50% Resources
upgrade.forge.tier-2.name: +100% Resources
upgrade.forge.tier-3.name: Generation of Emeralds
upgrade.forge.tier-4.name: +200% Resources
upgrade.heal-pool.name: Regeneration
upgrade.heal-pool.lore:
Creates a regeneration field
around your base.
upgrade.dragon-buff.name: Dragon Buff
upgrade.dragon-buff.lore:
Your team will benefit
from 2 dragons instead of 1 in the
sudden death phase.
trap.blindness.name: It's a Trap
trap.blindness.lore:
Inflicts Blindness and Slowness
for 8 seconds.
trap.counter-offensive.name: Counter-Attack Trap
trap.counter-offensive.lore:
Grants nearby allied players
Speed II and Jump Boost II
for 15 seconds near your base.
trap.alarm.name: Alarm Trap
trap.alarm.lore:
Reveals invisible players
as well as their name and team.
trap.miner-fatigue.name: Fatigue Trap
no-trap.title: Trap #%number%:
no-trap.lore:
The %word% enemy entering
your base will trigger this trap.
no-trap.sub-lore:
Buying a trap will store it
here. Its cost will be proportional
to the number of traps stored.
bed.broken.title: BED DESTROYED!
bed.broken.subtitle: You can no longer respawn.
bed.broken.message: §lBED DESTROYED >§7 The %team%'s bed has been broken
bed.broken.message.player: §lBED DESTROYED >§7 The %team%'s bed has been broken by %enemy%
chest.cant-open.team: You cannot open the chest until the team is eliminated!
inventory.hotbar-manager.title: Hotbar Manager
hotbar.inventory.navbar.lore:
Click to change the position
of items to facilitate
their purchase.
hotbar.inventory.navbar.placed.lore:
The %name% items will
have priority in this slot.
hotbar.inventory.compass.title: Compass
hotbar.inventory.compass.lore:
Click to change the position
of the compass.
